method: Preheat your oven to the temperature specified on the pizza dough package.
Roll out the pizza dough into your desired shape and thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Add pepperoni slices and bell peppers as desired.
Bake the pizza according to the pizza dough package instructions, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Let the pizza cool before serving it to your dog.
Watch them jump for joy as they enjoy this perfectly paw-some pizza!
